feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix: date helper format mismatch (#6137) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(customerio): don't send customer identifier as event id (#6391) @AdamSelene
  • feat(microsoft-outlook-calendar): add offline_access to oauth2 scope (#6390) @antonyvigouret
  • fix(qdrant): fix content/payload field for add points action (#6378) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(get-public-ip): resolve issue when Google DNS is blocked (#6401) @amrabuaza
  • fix: allow pasting in empty flows (#6400) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(s3-validation): add s3 conifguration validation (#6395) @amrabuaza

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add ChineseHamberger as a contributor for plugin (#6383) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: Security upgrade node from 18.20.4-bullseye-slim to 18.20.5-bullseye-slim (#6381) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrabuaza, @antonyvigouret, @kishanprmr and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add time range picker to date filters on tables like runs and audit logs (#6399) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat: add check-file-type action for file-helper (#6375) @ChineseHamberger
  • fix(google-sheets): fix row number response (#6408) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: allow duplicate entries in dictionary inputs (#6410) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: multi selection shortcuts on mac (#6409) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: cancel multi selection when right click is clicked outside the selection box (#6409) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @ChineseHamberger, @abuaboud and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.4
entry.content:
‚õìÔ∏è‚Äçüí• Breaking Changes

  • chore: remove sign in with github (#6415) @abuaboud

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: Support Project Releases (#6340) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: support bulk push to git-sync (#6431) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat(hubspot): 18 triggers and 38 actions (#6377) @kishanprmr
  • feat(intercom): find conversation action (#6416) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-my-business): add pagination for location dropdown (#6438) @kishanprmr
  • feat(google-drive): add includeTrashed option to googleDriveListFiles action (#6443) @janwytze
  • feat(discord): new member trigger (#6436) @AshotZaqoyan
  • feat(baserow): add email field (#6419) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: enforce assigning global connection to at least one project (#6447) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: improve skipped steps styling (#6429) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add alerts in flows/runs pages for task usage reaching limit + add widget to see tasks/ai credits consumption (#6423) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: add project release audit events and bug fixes (#6428) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add project release view and remove download button (#6418) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: update Enivroments & Releases docs (#6441) @hazemadelkhalel
  • docs: add AshotZaqoyan as a contributor for plugin (#6437) @allcontributors
  • docs: add project release docs and add git-sync configuration (#6433) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • remove public schema from migration file. (#6445) @jasonfill
  • chore: remove sign in with github (#6415) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AshotZaqoyan, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @janwytze, @jasonfill and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.5

üêû Bug Fixes

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.6
entry.content:
BREAKING CHANGE ‚ö†Ô∏è

Please read the following If you have separated the workers in their own servers: Breaking Changes Documentation

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheets): issue with finding sheets when id is text not number (#6452) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: check if git_repo table exists before dropping mapping column (#6455) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(google-sheets): issue with finding sheets when id is text not number (#6452) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add default value action (#6450) @Anmol-Gup

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add amrabuaza as a contributor for plugin (#6453) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Anmol-Gup, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot] and @hazemadelkhalel
